text: walamma rajaʿa musa ila qawmihi ghadbana asifan qala bi'sama khalaftumuni min baʿdi aʿajil'tum amra rabbikum wa-alqa l-alwaha wa-akhadha birasi akhihi yajurruhu ilayhi qala ib'na umma inna l-qawma is'tadʿafuni wakadu yaqtulunani fala tush'mit biya l-aʿdaa wala tajʿalni maʿa l-qawmi l-zalimina
